---
title: "️US Presidential Elections"
format: dashboard
server: shiny
---

```{r}
#| context: setup

library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(shiny)
library(rmarkdown)

presidents <- read_csv("~/R/project-2-team_ella/data/1976-2020-president.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

tibble_test <- tibble(
  c(1, 2)
)
tibble_test <- as.data.frame(tibble_test)
```


```{r}

selectInput(
    inputId = "input_year",
    label = strong("Election Year"),
    choices = unique(presidents$year),
    selected = 2000
  )
```

# Data

```{r}
tableOutput('data')
```


```{r}
#| context: server

presidents_reactive <- reactive({
  presidents |>
    filter(year == input$input_year)
})


output$data <- renderTable({
  presidents
})

```
